Don't hesitate to PM me if you have any questions or problem with the download, as comments on the torrent are easy to miss.

Enjoy! 



Whether it's a mighty battle between ancient gods, the Second Coming of a Biblical saviour, or a pesky Millennial computer virus, we've always wondered how the world would end. And whether we'd be (un)lucky enough to see it. This book explores some of the theories about the end of days, looking from religion to science and everything in between. Some are silly enough to laugh at, others might scare you to death. Either way, you'll find the End is nigh; it's right between these pages
